#1926 (CUE)

exec hof export foo.cue dev.json
exec hof vet    foo.cue dev.json

exec hof export foo.cue prd.json
exec hof vet    foo.cue prd.json

-- foo.cue --
package foo

_env: =~"(prd)-"

#Foo

#Foo: {
	env: "dev" | _env
	baz: bool | *false

	if env == "dev" {
		_defaults.dev
	}
}

_defaults: {
	"dev": {
		baz: true
	}
}

-- prd.json --
{
	"env": "prd-foo"
}
-- dev.json --
{
	"env": "dev"
}
